WorkItem.Description:
Forum post/reply without a memeber photo (nophoto.gif) generates error.
FileNotFound Exception was unhandled by user code \images\nophoto.gif.
Â 
nophoto.gif is located in both themes i.e. \themes\Clubsite\nophoto.gif
WorkItem.Summary: FileNotFound Exception was unhandled by user code

Comments.Message: An easy solution would be to add nophoto.gif to the \images folder, but I think the code was intended to look to the new location \themes\

\UserControls\AvatarImageFetch.ashx

Catch ex As Exception            response.ContentType = "image\gif"            response.TransmitFile(context.Server.MapPath("~/images") & "\nophoto.gif")            Return        Finally

Is this a missing image or an incorrect image referance?  Another words should the code be looking in the themes folder or should we copy the nophoto.gif to the \images folder?

Not trying to be picky, just would like to remove duplicate images and or correct image references.

thanks
